price: (57) If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walawlā niʿ'matu rabbī lakuntu mina al-muḥ'ḍarīna
